author: jcompagner
msg: AjaxRequestTarget was not calling IHeaderResponse.close() after traversing hierarchy to renderhead on all appropriate iheadercontributors
the close was called way to early, so that the next component after the first one couldnt contribute to the head anymore because it was already closed
